item.title: Grab a nice wallpaper every day
item.description: This is a small tool I developed to grab the latest image from the National Geographic’s website and save it in a specific folder. The os then updates the wallpaper daily. It is not as easy it seems to grab the picture from the web site, as the current hierarchy does not make it easy. However, looking at the source code of the page, we can see this interesting line :

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Hello world, I am just messing around with hugo the static website generator.
